snippet: Like Kep, many coastal idylls are discovered, lost, and then found again. Here are a few destinations that have recently reentered the travel mix.
abstract: Many coastal idylls are discovered, lost and then found again; roundup of island destinations that have recently reentered the travel mix.
lead_paragraph: Like Kep, many coastal idylls are discovered, lost, and then found again. Here are a few destinations that have recently reentered the travel mix.

headline.main: On, Then Off, Then Back on the Map
